text: un logon kee khvaahish to ye hai ki jis tarah vah kaafir ho gae tum bhee kaafir ho jao taaki tum unake baraabar ho jao pas jab tak vah khuda kee raah mein hijarat na karen to unamen se kisee ko dost na banao phir agar vah usase bhee munh moden to unhen giraphtaar karo aur jaho pao unako qatl karo aur unamen se kisee ko na apana dost banao na madadagaar
